sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react' import emailjs from 'emailjs-com' const initialState = { name: '', email: '', message: '', } export const Contact = (props: any) => { const [{ name, email, message }, setState] = useState(initialState) const handleChange = (e: React.FormEvent | React.ChangeEvent) => { console.log('e.target') const { name, value } = e.currentTarget setState((prevState) => ({ ...prevState, [name]: value })) } const clearState = () => setState({ ...initialState }) const handleSubmit = (e: React.FormEvent) => { e.preventDefault() console.log(name, email, message) emailjs .sendForm( 'YOUR_SERVICE_ID', 'YOUR_TEMPLATE_ID', email, 'YOUR_USER_ID' ) .then( (result: { text: any; }) => { console.log(result.text) clearState() }, (error: { text: any; }) => { console.log(error.text) } ) } return (

Get In Touch

Please fill out the form below to send us an email and we will get back to you as soon as possible.

Contact Info

Address {props.data ? props.data.address : 'loading'}

Phone {' '} {props.data ? props.data.phone : 'loading'}

Email {' '} {props.data ? props.data.email : 'loading'}

) }
